name: Mobile Drift
description:
Now, time to heat asphalt! Use your skills and show us " What a racer!"
Mobile Drift is a real drift simulator. You're in the right place if you like drift!
Live real driving pleasure with different control options.
High-quality graphic sections, exclusive cars and own garage.
Make the longest drift, collect money, buy new cars and customize them.
Get silver, bronze or gold degree, collect extra money.

Game features:

* Realistic tracks, real cars and realistic drift feeling
* 10 different cars in your garage
* 3 different tracks specially designed for drift
* Replay feature using different cameras
* Different driving cameras
* Different driving mobile controls
* Daily gifts

Join the funny world of Mobile Drift!
